00056 /* Creation flags. */
00057 #define T_FPU     XNFPU
00058 /* <!> Low bits must conflict with XNFPU|XNSHADOW. */
00059 #define T_CPU(id) ((id) & 0xff)
00060 
00061 /* Status flags. */
00062 #define T_BLOCKED XNPEND
00063 #define T_DELAYED XNDELAY
00064 #define T_READY   XNREADY
00065 #define T_DORMANT XNDORMANT
00066 #define T_STARTED XNSTARTED
00067 #define T_BOOST   XNBOOST
00068 #define T_LOCK    XNLOCK
00069 #define T_RRB     XNRRB

00073 #define RT_HOOK_TSWITCH XNHOOK_THREAD_SWITCH
00074 #define RT_HOOK_TDELETE XNHOOK_THREAD_DELETE
00075 #define RT_HOOK_TASKPTR(cookie) thread2rtask(cookie)

00077 /* Priority range. */
00078 #define T_HIPRIO  FUSION_LOW_PRI
00079 #define T_LOPRIO  FUSION_HIGH_PRI
00080 #define rtprio2xn(rtprio) (FUSION_HIGH_PRI - (rtprio) + 1)
00081 #define xnprio2rt(xnprio) (T_LOPRIO + (xnprio) - 1)

00084     rt_handle_t opaque;

00088 (T_FPU|T_BLOCKED|T_DELAYED|T_READY|T_DORMANT|T_STARTED|T_BOOST|T_LOCK|T_RRB)

00090 typedef struct rt_task_info {
00091 
00092     int bprio;                  /* !< Base priority. */
00093     int cprio;                  /* !< Current priority. */

00103 #define RTAI_TASK_MAGIC 0x55550101
00104 
00105 typedef struct rt_task {
00106 
00107     unsigned magic;   /* !< Magic code - must be first */
00108 
00109     xnholder_t link;
00110 
00111     xntimer_t timer;
00112 
00113 #define link2rtask(laddr) \
00114 ((RT_TASK *)(((char *)laddr) - (int)(&((RT_TASK *)0)->link)))
00115 
00116     xnthread_t thread_base;
00117 
00118 #define thread2rtask(taddr) \
00119 ((taddr) ? ((RT_TASK *)(((char *)(taddr)) - (int)(&((RT_TASK *)0)->thread_base))) : NULL)
00120 
00121     rt_handle_t handle; /* !< Handle in registry -- zero if unregistered. */
00122 
00123     int suspend_depth;
00124 
00125     int overrun;
00126 
00127     union { /* Saved args for current synch. wait operation. */
00128 
00129         struct {
00130             int mode;
00131             unsigned long mask;
00132         } event;
00133 
00134     } wait_args;
00135 
00136 } RT_TASK;
